title: 跪求此MOD的安裝和使用方式！！！
author: altair22592
txt_content:
http://www.9minecraft.net/mob-talker-mod/


就是上面這個，


拜託了！！！

replies.author: zzcat770
replies.txt_content:
1.Install ModLoader correctly 正确安装Modleader
2.Download mod_Mobtalker.zip 下载本mod的文件mod_Mobtalker.zip
3.Choose one script file.(You can only choose one but you can merge them yourself.) 选择一个剧本文件（你只能选择一个，但可以将那些剧本文件自行合并为一个）
4.Put mod_Mobtalker.zip into /mods/ folder 将mod_Mobtalker.zip放入/mods文件夹内
5.Install the script file.Simply overwrite the /resource/ folder with the one inside zip file.简单将用zip中的剧本文件复制进/resource文件夹以覆盖原有的剧本文件
6.Check if the /resource/mobTalker_script/ was created. 检查一下是是否生成了/resource/mobTalker_script/目录
7.Run the game and enjoy! 运行游戏并享受吧

replies.author: zzcat770
replies.txt_content:
